urls.title: The Environment Agency Proposes Revocation of Licences
urls.description: The Environment Agency published a consultation on the revocation of eight abstraction licences throughout the UK. Driven by a new programme for sustainable abstraction, appropriate use of water resources and their conservation, the regulator set out the details of their proposal.

domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

text:
⚠️ The Lea is among the most polluted rivers in London

Swimming there risks infection and diarrhoea, with BBQs and litter causing damage to wildlife, including kingfisher and owl nests

We recently wrote to @EnvAgency to request an update on work to tackle pollution in the river https://t.co/JMMo4ca5Cn

This workshop from PPP Partners @EnvAgency  is available on 19th April to support businesses to address plastic waste: #preventingplasticpollution https://t.co/d4kVW9haP9

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

text: @BrianMcHugh2011 @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgency @yorkshirepost @BBCLookNorth @YorkshireWater @RachSalv There is more to add to that. I'm out tomorrow filming underwater the after effects of a discharge. If from what I've seen on the surface it won't be viewing with popcorn. It truly is a disgrace . Watch this space.

Now wondering why they’re dumping in cell 3 and stuff not from their own sites though!

text:
@Sarah_Winckless @theboatrace @matthewcpinsent @JenBartram @BBCSport @jamescracknell @CUBCsquad @stuartatcorpus @clarebalding @NatureUK @EnvAgency @metpoliceuk @MetPolice @OxfordUniBC @CambsCops @DanielZeichner @ClarenceHouse @EnvAgencyAnglia @NaturalEngland @Twitter @PryorFrancis This was recorded. 15:07-15:19. #EnvironmentAgency require details of this incident via email to ics@environment-agency.gov.uk 
Copy and paste of this email thread will be sufficient information. Sender of email does not have to be Nick Ward aka Banjo Nick, troubadour-boatman.

@greenarteries @BBCCambs @FewsLane @dottymcl @EnvAgencyAnglia @SouthCambs @Feargal_Sharkey Parish Council must take it’s share of responsibility. They are supposed to act for the residents and deal with their well documented concerns over this.
